about_the_game:
This is a small game of decrypting levels. Players need to control the various mechanisms in the levels to help the heroine get the flowers. The game contains a total of 30 levels for players to play.
The player needs to guide the pure water to fall on the seeds by removing the pins in the scene to ensure the growth of the seeds and allow the sisters to obtain the flowers grown from the seeds. At the same time, ensure that the water will not be polluted by evil spirits.
Regarding adult content, you need to click on the album to enter, and then click on the characters in the album to enter the interactive interface，All women are adults and do not include extreme sexual behaviors such as violent sexual assault.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
